text: Christopher Hart (born February 22, 1961) is a Canadian actor and magician whose roles include Thing, the disembodied hand, in the 1991, 1993 and 1998 movies The Addams Family, Addams Family Values, and Addams Family Reunion. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from British Columbia
title: Christopher Hart (actor)
